title: newnft
author: newnft
content: if i want to make my own voting dappor POSwhere users make decision what network is better to use ?? i dont want users to have to pay to vote so this is why i need something like POS mining ,,,, or anything else which can have free votingwhat do u suggest ?

comments.author: ahmia39
comments.body: Quote from: newnft on September 17, 2022, 04:25:08 AMif i want to make my own voting dappor POSwhere users make decision what network is better to use ?? i dont want users to have to pay to vote so this is why i need something like POS mining ,,,, or anything else which can have free votingwhat do u suggest ?The number of DApps currently has reached thousands and even millions. This happens because every blockchain with Smart Contract technology such as: Ethereum, BNB coin, Cardano, etc.However, UniSwap and PancakeSwap are the most preferred Decentralized Exchanges by crypto traders.In addition to these two names, of course there are other DEXs that are no less interesting.

comments.author: newnft
